name: More Human (PaulBondrea)
description:
In the world of Veldrum, beasts are common place. Some rarer than others.

Jales Hirojime, a young archer from the border of the country decides to enlist for an event: "The Grand Archipelago Hunt". Sightings of the legendary beast: The Garmoss have lead many self-proclaimed hunters to seek fame and fortune.  However, Jales isn't any other hunter. He is frail, thin and weak, so he is assigned a supervisor: Ery Rossweis. 

In the short span of three days, Jales' future will be decided. What kind of person he turns out to be is all in the player's hands!

Play this short prototype of what Jales' first few days might be like on his new adventure that takes place in an entirely original world brimming with unique lore!
